createPoll(string,string,int256,int256).notice: 1. Creation of a poll by an organization. 2. Ability to add eligible participants. 3. Adding candidates in the poll. 4. Allowing voters to vote, if they have not done so, and withing the time constraints. 5. After the end time, remove the poll from the list. 6. Allow view live vote count. 7. View the candidates' id.
